name: The Floor is Lava (itch) (Spartan Game Labs)
name_original: The Floor is Lava (itch) (Spartan Game Labs)
description:
This game is a 2 player vertical platformer where each player races to the top to stay alive from the rising lava, all while fighting each other. The first player to touch the lava loses. However, if no one dies to the lava, the first person to reach the portal at the top wins.

Controls:

Player 1: Up arrow to jump, left arrow to move left, and right arrow to move right. Down arrow to use a special ability that charges over time and pushes the opponent away.

Player 2: “W” to jump, “A” to move left, and “D” to move right. “S” to use a special ability that charges over time and pushes the opponent away.
